name: WatchItAll
0:
”Alexa, open watch it all”
”Alexa, watch it all”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: watch it all
des:
Daily updates of what’s new on Netflix Unofficial, Disney Plus Unofficial, Hulu Unofficial, HBO Unofficial and Amazon Prime Video Unofficial, including the new releases, weekly highlights and a complete list of new movies and TV series.

With love from Argentina!

This Skill was not created or endorsed by Netflix or Disney or Hulu or HBO or Amazon.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
